color.b: Right click to toggle the mouse cursor on and off.
Right click to enter photo mode.

ZTPhotoMode.Challenge2stt: Take a picture of an elephant browsing.
ZTPhotoMode.Challenge3stt: Take a picture of an elephant walking.
ZTPhotoMode.Challenge2Completestt: Challenge complete (take a picture of an elephant browsing).
ZTPhotoMode.Challenge3Completestt: Challenge complete (take a picture of an elephant walking).
ZTPhotoMode.challenge_tiger_eating_stt: Take a picture of a tiger eating.
ZTPhotoMode.challenge_tiger_eating_cstt: Challenge complete (take a picture of a tiger eating).
ZTPhotoMode.challenge_tiger_walking_stt: Take a picture of a tiger walking.
ZTPhotoMode.challenge_tiger_walking_cstt: Challenge complete (take a picture of a tiger walking).
ZTPhotoMode.challenge_hungry_tiger_stt: Take a picture of a hungry tiger.
ZTPhotoMode.challenge_hungry_tiger_cstt: Challenge complete (take a picture of a hungry tiger).
ZTPhotoMode.challenge_mother_and_young_tiger_stt: Take a picture of a mother tiger with her young.
ZTPhotoMode.challenge_mother_and_young_tiger_cstt: Challenge complete (take a picture of a mother tiger with her young).
ZTPhotoMode.challenge_tiger_and_gorilla_stt: Take a picture of a tiger by a gorilla.
ZTPhotoMode.challenge_tiger_and_gorilla_cstt: Challenge complete (take a picture of a tiger by a gorilla).
ZTPhotoMode.UndoneChallengeltt: You must take a picture that completes the listed requirements in order to fulfill the photo challenge.
ZTPhotoMode.SubmitPhotosstt: Submit your photos to the photo challenge.
